data.title: Sacred Heart Church, Pāhoa, United States – Latin Mass Directory
data.meta_description: A Catholic directory of approved traditional Latin Masses
data.text:
The Traditional Latin Mass is currently being allowed at this Parish until Advent 2025. However, the schedule of Masses and Holy Day Observances is not to permitted to be published in the Church's bulletin.

The Father celebrating the Mass is a Somascan and is among 10 priests allowed to celebrate the Traditional Latin Mass in the Diocese of Honolulu.

For updates, schedule changes, schedules for Holy Day Observances and additional Masses, visit the Facebook page.
